name: Swamp Adder
description: The Swamp Adder is a small, stealthy snake-like creature that thrives in wet, murky environments, using its camouflage to remain undetected.
memorable: Its ability to paralyze with a single bite makes it a dangerous ambush predator.
goals: Hunts for prey by hiding and striking with venomous bites.
relations: Commonly found in swamp areas, may encounter various swamp-dwelling creatures.
environment: Wet and murky environments like swamps.
strengths: Camouflage in swampy terrain allows it to ambush effectively.
weaknesses: Low durability due to low hit points and weak physical strength.
attacks: Bite attack deals piercing damage and can inflict paralysis through poison.
most_powerful_ability: Swamp Camouflage grants advantage on Stealth checks in swampy terrain.
senses: Has blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to sense nearby creatures without relying on sight.
additional_information: Effective ambush predator due to high Dexterity and camouflage.
Paralysis lasts for 1 minute unless saving throws are successful.
Ability to deal both piercing and poison damage.
Small size allows it to hide easily in dense vegetation.
Dependent on stealth rather than direct confrontation.
test_queries: snake that can paralyze with poison
